mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Sarah Tracy to Ann Pamela Cunningham, 1861 February 22
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tracy, Sarah, 1820-1896
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter from Sarah Tracy, secretary, to Ann Pamela Cunningham, February 22, 1861. Washington, DC. Receives Regent's letters regularly. Boat trips to begin Saturday. Washington is crowded. Alexandria Gazette articles copied from Southern paper, but evidently went no further. Saw Miss Willard of Troy and Mrs. Phelps. Mrs. Barry glad Regent is at Mount Vernon.
